record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - October 23, 2007)

[Page: H11900]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include therein extraneous material on H.R. 1011.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from West Virginia?
